features: It’s the perfect spring day. A warm breeze wakes the sleeping willow and you hear the giggles of your little one inside the house. This perfect moment is the simplistic charm of Sweet Pea.
Caldrea's Sweet Pea Laundry Detergent is hardworking yet respectful to your wardrobe
Essential oils and plant-derived surfactants are blended together to diligently remove odors and stains from washable fabrics. Compatible with both top and front-loading washing machines.
Laundry soap‚ is safe and effective for all fabrics and water temperatures
Powerful plant-based ingredients keep whites white and colors vivid
Biodegradable HE detergent. Made without Phosphate and Chlorine
Hardworking yet respectful to your wardrobe
Keep whites white and colors vivid
Effective for all fabrics and water temperatures
body.description: Caldrea Sweet Pea Laundry Detergent is hardworking yet respectful to your wardrobe. Ozone, Chamomile, Apple and Mandarin top notes leave you wanting more, while Chamomile, Bergamot, Rose and Coriander Essential Oils create an intricate, harmonious fragrance. Powerful plant-based ingredients keep whites white and colors vivid. HE compatible, this biodegradable laundry soap is safe and effective for all fabrics and water temperatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would order again
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell! Clothing seems to be clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes you happy
reviews.reviewText: I hate doing laundry but since the pandemic I do more of it, especially atheleisure. Since athletic wear has gotten so pricey lately, I try and hand wash/line dry my Lululemon, Athleta, Adidas & yoga wear. I used this product for years on my fine washable sweaters but it was hard to find and somewhat pricey. Now since I can buy on Amazon and have it delivered I can watch the prices a bit easier and ai always grab a few larger bottles (the detergent and fabric softener are my favorite in any brand hands down, but their entire product like is very nice). The scents are pure and concentrated but nit in a string perfume-y or in an artificial way but you can fill the room with the lovely scents while washing and it leaves a mild scent on the washed items as well but not so much that you would smell it wearing it. Sweet pea is my favorite but all of the scents are so nice and you don’t have to stay with one. They mix just fine.But the product itself is very high quality. A little but cleans quite a bit and will last me a long time. And I can ever wash cashmere and wool and hang dry so they look as good as new.For both scent and cleaning this product is the best on the market for hand washables (or regular laundry is you so indulge). I signed they had more fragrances available lately and that’s the only downside. I have a hard time finding them consistently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always Use Caldrea
reviews.reviewText: Best home products and smells good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this and their products!
reviews.reviewText: I love all their products and have not found one that I don’t like. Their scents are so well done, and I even gift them to people and their feedback is phenomenal as well. I do wish it was more affordable but one of my “luxury” purchase. I only use it on certain loads to try and conserve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The smell is gorgeous but then again so are ALL of Caldrea's products. I use it to wash delicates and they smell amazing. The detergent definitely cleans well. The jug is pretty large and using it as sparingly as I do I'll definitely have it a long time. I think it's worth it to have delicates smell special so I'll pay more for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cleaning with this
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the better high-end eco-friendly laundry detergents I've used. I have found it cleans well. Lavendar Pine is a very strong scent that will totally perfume your laundry area but isn't overwhelming once clothes are dried. A touch stronger than regular lavendar with the pine undertone. I just got the Ginger Pomelo and have to say I was a tad bit disappointed only because it doesn't really smell like ginger or pomelo at all, although I did notice a very pleasant smell in the laundry area afterwards. Sweet pea is a very pleasant, slightly sweet floral smell, and probably my favorite as it is subtle but noticeable. I have had the Blue Sage in their general cleaning formula and it is not for me. I'm not sure what it smells like, certainly not sage I am familiar with (sage is a love of mine), but it is very strong; however, my neighbor loved it and I gave it to her. So that will leave me one scent to try I suppose. None of these smells have left an overwhelming scent on my clothes once dried, but they all greatly perfume the laundry area. I feel it leaves my cottons and linens pretty soft also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fragrance is important
reviews.reviewText: the best smelling laundry soap I have ever used.I am really picky I have been using essential oils for a long time and this laundry soap smells very clean not perfumy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Laundry Detergent Is Fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I wanted to have my clothes and bedding come out of he dryer with a scent as fresh as when the weather is nice and I can use my outdoor clothes line. The scent of this detergent soft and fresh. And while it doesn't quite smell like the sun, it does a great job leaving me with clean items. Stains come out in one washing. I would recommend this detergent with no reservations.
Great wash and amazing smell! I use these on everything I wash. The awesome smell is addictive and makes the regular detergents smell like hospital cleansers.
